list.bullet: A combination between a set and a hash
every element in a sorted set is associated with a floating point value, called the score
list.example: 127.0.0.1:6379> ZADD whisky:rating 4 pulteney-11 2.0 glenfarclas-12 4.0 fettercairn-23 (integer) 3 127.0.0.1:6379> ZRANGE whisky:rating 0 -1 WITHSCORES 1) "glenfarclas-12" 2) "2" 3) "fettercairn-23" 4) "4" 5) "pulteney-11" 6) "4" 127.0.0.1:6379> ZRANGEBYSCORE whisky:rating 3 5 1) "fettercairn-23" 2) "pulteney-11"
